snippet.title: FINAL FANTASY X/X-2 HD Remaster - Return to Spira Trailer | PS4
snippet.description:
Experience two of the greatest RPGs ever made as these groundbreaking titles become a must-have part of any PlayStation®4 owner’s library on May 12th, 2015. The PS4 version contains the beautiful HD graphics, all of the International Edition and extra content previously released on PS3, and new to PS4, cross-save functionality with the PS3 and PS VITA versions, and the option to switch between the remastered and original music of FINAL FANTASY X. 

Pre-order now to receive a free desktop calendar, featuring illustrations by renowned FINAL FANTASY artist, Yoshitaka Amano.
PRE-ORDER NOW: http://amzn.to/195G87b

https://www.facebook.com/FinalFantasyX
http://finalfantasyxhd.com/

©2001-2004, 2013-2015 SQUARE ENIX CO., LTD. All Rights Reserved. CHARACTER DESIGN: TETSUYA NOMURA
FINAL FANTASY, SQUARE ENIX and the SQUARE ENIX logo are registered trademarks or trademarks of Square Enix Holdings Co., Ltd. The “PS” Family logo is a registered trademark and “PS4” is a trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment Inc.
